amendment.description: To amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to reform the funding of benefits under the Civil Service Retirement System for employees of the United states Postal Service, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 469 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 469 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S4729) To amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to reform the funding of benefits under the Civil Service Retirement System for employees of the United states Postal Service, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 469 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 469 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Collins.
